info.name: Terminology Standards Service Collection
info.description:
Documentation describing the parts of the FHIR specification implemented by Ontoserver

[https://ontoserver.csiro.au/docs/6/api-fhir.html](https://ontoserver.csiro.au/docs/6/api-fhir.html)

Further detail also available in the FHIR specification for the terminology module

[https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/terminology-module.html](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/terminology-module.html)
